snippet: BASILICE--Patrick J.,of Medford, formerly of Dix Hills. Age 92. Beloved husband of Carmela (nee: Messina). Devoted brother to Marie Accardi. Father of Joseph (Lisa) Basilice and Linda (Augie) Hoerrner. Adored grandfather of Patrick, Lucianna, Meli...
lead_paragraph: BASILICE--Patrick J.,of Medford, formerly of Dix Hills. Age 92. Beloved husband of Carmela (nee: Messina). Devoted brother to Marie Accardi. Father of Joseph (Lisa) Basilice and Linda (Augie) Hoerrner. Adored grandfather of Patrick, Lucianna, Melissa, Diana, Tina, AJ, Petra, and Paul. Caring great-grandfather to six. Patrick served his country as a proud World War II Veteran and an honored Dean of Saint John's University. There was no kinder, caring, loving man who with his sharp mind, soft manner and great wisdom was able to enrich the lives of so many. Family to receive friends Wednesday 2:00pm-5:00pm and 7:00pm-9:30pm at Mangano Funeral Home, Inc., 1701 Deer Park Avenue, Deer Park. Funeral Mass Thursday 9:45am Saint Matthew R.C.C., 35 North Service Road, Dix Hills. Entombment to follow Pinelawn Memorial Park, Pinelawn, NY. www.manganofh.com 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BASILICE, PATRICK J.
